static LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.thinning.MedialAxisSkeletonization.findSkeleton ( LatLonGrid  input,
int  thresh,
File  out 
) throws Exception [static] 

00027                                                                                                    {
00028         // threshold and invert
00029         LatLonGrid binaryImage = new SimpleThresholder(thresh).threshold(input);
00030         if (out != null){
00031             KmlWriter.write(binaryImage, out, "thresh", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00032         }
00033         binaryImage = new Inverter(1).invert(binaryImage);
00034         
00035         // compute distance to pts > 0 i.e. boundary pixels
00036         LatLonGrid edt = new EuclideanDTSaito().getDistanceTransform(binaryImage, 0);
00037         if (out != null){
00038             KmlWriter.write(edt, out, "edt", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00039         }
00040         
00041         // retain local maximum in 4-neighborhood
00042         LatLonGrid result = new LatLonGrid(edt.getNumLat(),edt.getNumLon(),edt.getMissing(),edt.getNwCorner(),edt.getLatRes(),edt.getLonRes());
00043         for (int i=1; i < edt.getNumLat()-1; ++i){
00044             for (int j=1; j < edt.getNumLon()-1; ++j){
00045                 int edtval = edt.getValue(i, j);
00046                 if ( edtval != 0 &&
00047                      edt.getValue(i-1,j) <= edtval &&
00048                      edt.getValue(i,j-1) <= edtval &&
00049                      edt.getValue(i+1,j) <= edtval &&
00050                      edt.getValue(i,j+1) <= edtval ){
00051                     result.setValue(i,j, 1);
00052                 } else {
00053                     result.setValue(i,j, 0);
00054                 }
00055             }
00056         }
00057         return result;
00058     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.thinning.MedialAxisSkeletonization.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00060                                                             {
00061         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("matskeleton");
00062         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, new GlobalPopulation.LogScaling()).crop(900, 2500, 200, 200);
00063         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "orig", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00064 
00065         popdensity = new DilateErodeFilter(2,3).filter(popdensity);
00066         // popdensity = new ErosionFilter(3).filter(popdensity);
00067         popdensity = new ErodeDilateFilter(2,3).filter(popdensity);
00068         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "filledin", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00069         
00070         LatLonGrid result = findSkeleton(popdensity, 300, out);
00071         result.setMissing(0); // to make the 1s pop out
00072         KmlWriter.write(result, out, "mat", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00073     }
